short_summary: The Government of Canada intends to purchase radio communication equipment from qualified bidders.
duration_in_months: Now issuing a tender to upgrade deerial radio communication apparatusN.B. The project is currently Work-In-Progress (Wip).
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

## TENDER TITLE

Communication Equipment for Canadian Coast Guard Small Craft Fleet

## GANG NUMBER-BASE DE DONNEES

PW-__QF-134-29158

## PUBLIC NOTICE

Request for Proposal (RFP) - Solicitation Number: F2603-230002/A

## TENDER DEADLINE

Tender closing date is 2023-09-22 14:00:00.

## PROCUREMENT DETAILS

Description: The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) requires the purchase of communication equipment for its small craft fleet, including numerous small and larger pieces of equipment that make up the complete system.

Trade Agreement: CFTA and FTAs with Peru, Colombia, Panama, and South Korea.

 ## CONTRACT TERM

Contract period: One year from the date of contract award, with an option to extend by up to two additional one-year periods under the same conditions.

## INVITATION TO BID

Eligible suppliers may submit a bid through the epost Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation.

## DOCUMENTS

Documentation is available on the Canada Buys website.

## ENQUIRIES

All enquiries must be submitted in writing to the contracting authority no later than five calendar days before the bid closing date.

## DELIVERY REQUIREMENTS

Delivery details are outlined in the bid solicitation documents.

## BUSINESS LANGUAGE

Both English and French are acceptable for submitting documents.

## CONTRACT LANGUAGE

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
